entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:28 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -37.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -37.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %

Dewpoint: -41.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
